
### Leaflet

<https://github.com/rstudio/leaflet>

Leaflet is a JavaScript library for interactive maps based on OpenStreetMap data.

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
```

```{r}
leaflet() %>% 
  tileLayer() %>% 
  setView(c(42.0285, -93.65), zoom = 17) %>% 
  mapPopup(42.0285, -93.65, 'ISU Dept. of Statistics')
```
